BackstoryDef.title: archite volunteer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] enlisted in a secret military program that promised glory and strength. The experiments left [PAWN_objective] tougher than most, but the treatments damaged [PAWN_possessive] fine motor skills and stability.

BackstoryDef.title: trial subject
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] signed away [PAWN_possessive] rights for a chance to join an experimental unit. Endless injections and training made [PAWN_objective] resilient, but constant observation and confinement left [PAWN_objective] anxious and withdrawn.

BackstoryDef.title: gene fighter
BackstoryDef.description: Chosen for a military experiment, [PAWN_nameDef] underwent forced genetic alterations meant to create stronger soldiers. The project gave [PAWN_objective] an edge in battle, but the constant tests left little time for education or civilian skills.

BackstoryDef.title: military experiment
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] volunteered for classified experiments, believing it was [PAWN_possessive] duty. Enhanced reflexes and stronger muscles were the results — but at the cost of chronic pain and a short temper.

BackstoryDef.title: enhanced soldier
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] became part of a military program to create supersoldiers through archite injections. The procedures hardened [PAWN_objective] for combat, but the constant modifications dulled [PAWN_possessive] sense of self and left [PAWN_objective] detached from ordinary life.

BackstoryDef.title: bone reforged
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was subjected to a brutal trial where every bone in [PAWN_possessive] body was shattered, replaced, and rebuilt with reinforced grafts. The process left [PAWN_objective] nearly unbreakable, but the constant agony scarred [PAWN_possessive] mind forever.

BackstoryDef.title: skin grafted
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] underwent repeated skin-flaying and regenerative grafting, designed to test rapid healing serums. The experiments made [PAWN_objective] resistant to injury, but also dulled [PAWN_possessive] sense of touch and left [PAWN_possessive] body covered in scars.

BackstoryDef.title: brain probed
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a horrific program where archite nodes were drilled directly into [PAWN_possessive] brain. The procedures heightened reflexes and memory recall, but frequent blackouts and haunting visions still plague [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: muscle stitched
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] endured endless cycles of muscle excision and forced regrowth, each time restitched into denser configurations. The outcome was immense strength, but [PAWN_possessive] body remains grotesquely uneven and constantly aches from the strain.

BackstoryDef.title: eye replaced
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had both eyes removed and replaced with unstable experimental augments, meant to track targets in darkness. The implants improved [PAWN_possessive] aim, but left [PAWN_objective] sensitive to light and forever reliant on strange visual overlays.

BackstoryDef.title: stress test subject
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was confined for weeks in controlled conditions, deprived of sleep and overloaded with sensory input to measure endurance. The tests broke [PAWN_possessive] nerves, leaving [PAWN_objective] twitchy but strangely resistant to stress.

BackstoryDef.title: toxic exposure
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was sealed in chambers filled with toxic vapors as part of a military resilience program. The experience scarred [PAWN_possessive] lungs and burned [PAWN_possessive] skin, but [PAWN_pronoun] learned to push through sickness and pain.

BackstoryDef.title: pain tolerance trial
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] endured endless procedures designed to push the limits of human pain tolerance. Though the agony left [PAWN_objective] hardened, [PAWN_pronoun] never truly recovered [PAWN_possessive] sense of trust in others.

BackstoryDef.title: isolation chamber
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was kept alone in a silent, lightless cell for months while researchers studied the effects of sensory deprivation. The ordeal left [PAWN_objective] distant and withdrawn, but strangely focused when working alone.

BackstoryDef.title: combat drill subject
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was forced through punishing combat drills meant to test the breaking point of soldiers under fire. The brutal regimen honed [PAWN_possessive] instincts, but left [PAWN_objective] with lingering injuries and a deep mistrust of authority.

BackstoryDef.title: deception study
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was placed in a program that rewarded lying and punished honesty. Over time, [PAWN_pronoun] became skilled at reading people, but found it difficult to form genuine connections.

BackstoryDef.title: conflict subject
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was locked in rooms with other subjects while researchers manipulated resources to force conflict. The constant fighting sharpened [PAWN_possessive] survival instincts, but trust became impossible.

BackstoryDef.title: obedience trial
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent years in a program designed to test the limits of obedience to authority. Following orders became second nature, but [PAWN_objective] never learned to make decisions for [PAWN_objective]self.

BackstoryDef.title: isolation test
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was forced into false social situations where allies would suddenly vanish or betray them. The shifting rules left [PAWN_objective] paranoid, but keenly aware of small details others overlook.

BackstoryDef.title: loss experiment
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was made to form bonds with fellow subjects, only to watch them be taken away again and again. The grief left scars, but also gave [PAWN_objective] an unusual resilience to despair.

BackstoryDef.title: betrayal study
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was forced into experiments where subjects were paired as close companions, only to be tricked into betraying one another for survival. The cruelty broke [PAWN_possessive] ability to trust, but sharpened [PAWN_possessive] instincts for danger.

BackstoryDef.title: false family
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was placed into simulated households with strangers acting as kin, only to have them vanish without explanation. This cycle repeated until [PAWN_pronoun] stopped forming bonds at all, surviving instead through cold detachment.

BackstoryDef.title: starvation trial
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] endured experiments where food was withheld and rations were deliberately uneven, forcing subjects to beg or fight for scraps. Hunger carved deep scars into [PAWN_possessive] mind, leaving [PAWN_objective] restless and distrustful of generosity.

BackstoryDef.title: compassion punished
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] lived through trials where showing kindness meant punishment, while cruelty was rewarded. Over time, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to hide compassion behind a mask of cold obedience, though the instinct to care never fully left.

BackstoryDef.title: silence study
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in enforced silence, punished for speaking or even making noise. The isolation left [PAWN_objective] almost mute in groups, but gave [PAWN_possessive] an uncanny focus when working alone.
